src:
KPK Panggil Direktur PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo Terkait Suap Baggage Handling system
05 Nov 2019, 11:33 by Chairul Umam


KPK Panggil Direktur PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo Terkait Suap Baggage Handling system

KBRN, Jakarta : Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) hari ini dijadwalkan memanggil sekaligus memeriksa Direktur PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo  Agung Sedayu dalam kasus Tindak Pidana Korupsi (Tipikor) proyek pembangunan sistem penanganan bagasi atau Baggage Handling System (BHS), Selasa (05/11/2019).
Rencana proyek itu nantinya akan diperuntukkan PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP). Sedangkan pelaksana proyek itu dipercayakan kepada PT Industri Telekomunikasi Indonesia (INTI) dengan menggunakan anggaran Tahun 2019.
Kabiro Humas KPK, Febri Diansyah menjelasakan bahwa Agung sedayu dijadwalkan akan diperiksa untuk tersangka Darman Mappangara, mantan Direktur Utama (Dirut) PT INTI. 
"KPK dijadwalkan memeriksa Direktur Utama PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo  Agung Sedayu untuk tersangka DMP (Darma Mappangara) terkait tindak pidana korupsi suap pekerjaan Baggage Handling System (BHS) pada PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP) yang dilaksanakan oleh PT Industri Telekomunikasi Indonesia (INTI) Tahun 2019," kata Febri Diansyah.
KPK sebelumnya telah menetapkan dua orang tersangka, mantan Direktur Keuangan PT Angkasa Pura II Andra Agussalam (AYA) dan Taswin Nur (TSW) dari pihak swasta atau teman dekat dari Darman Mappangara.
Selanjutnya, dalam pengembangan kasus itu, KPK menetapkan Darman sebagai tersangka baru.  Sementara itu tersangka Taswin saat sedang menjalani proses  persidangan di Gesung Pengadilan Tindak Pidana Korupsi (Tipikor) Jakarta. Taswin didakwa menjadi perantara suap kepada Andra sebesar 71 ribu dolar AS dan 96.700 Dolar Singapura (SGD). 
Tujuan pemberian uang tersebut diduga agat PT INTI menjadi pelaksana pekerjaan dalam pengadaan dan pemasangan Semi Baggage Handling System (BHS) di Kantor Cabang PT Angkasa Pura (AP) II antara PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP) dan PT INTI.
text:
KPK Calls Director of PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo Regarding the Bribe Baggage Handling System
05 Nov 2019, 11:33 by Chairul Umam


KPK Calls Director of PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo Regarding the Bribe Baggage Handling System

KBRN, Jakarta: The Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) today is scheduled to summon as well as examine the Director of PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo Agung Sedayu in the Corruption Case (Tipikor) project for the construction of a baggage handling system or Baggage Handling System (BHS), Tuesday (05/11 / 2019).
The project plan will be intended for PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP). While the project implementer was entrusted to PT Industri Telekomunikasi Indonesia (INTI) using the 2019 budget.
KPK's Public Relations Head, Febri Diansyah explained that Agung Sedayu was scheduled to be questioned for the suspect Darman Mappangara, former President Director of PT INTI.
"The KPK is scheduled to examine the President Director of PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo Agung Sedayu for DMP (Darma Mappangara) suspects related to the corruption of the bribery corruption of the Baggage Handling System (BHS) work at PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP) carried out by PT Industri Telekomunikasi Indonesia (INTI) of the Year. 2019, "said Febri Diansyah.
The KPK had previously named two suspects, former Finance Director of PT Angkasa Pura II Andra Agussalam (AYA) and Taswin Nur (TSW) from the private sector or a close friend of Darman Mappangara.
Furthermore, in developing the case, the KPK named Darman a new suspect. Meanwhile, the suspect Taswin was currently undergoing a trial process at the Jakarta Corruption Court Corruption Court. Taswin was charged with being a bribe broker to Andra in the amount of 71 thousand US dollars and 96,700 Singapore Dollars (SGD).
The purpose of giving the money is allegedly for PT INTI to be the executor of the work in the procurement and installation of the Semi Baggage Handling System (BHS) at the PT Angkasa Pura (AP) II Branch Office between PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP) and PT INTI.
